"スノウバンサーの肉の調達":
"The tundra of Naberius is home to a lot
of creatures that appear to be from a
time long forgotten. The Snow Banther is
a prime example. The way they jump and
bounce around so freely... They must
have incredible musculature. Hehehe...
y by that, of course, I mean the meat!
I really want to try cooking it.
※Cae de Nv.31+ Snow Banthers
y Snow Banshees."
